LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Commissariat_Lord.title: lord commissar
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Commissariat_Lord.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] climbed the ranks of the Commissariat by virtue in combat, social engineering, and a little bit of luck. [PAWN_nameDef] was a veteran of multiple campaigns, and was seen as a hero to those under their charge.
